casebody.data:
PUMPELLA, Appellant, v. BOARD OF TRUSTEES OF VILLAGE OF OWEGO, Respondent. (Supreme Court, General Term, Fourth Department. May 18, 1894.) In the matter of the assessment of damages to Gordon H. Pumpella, sustained by laying out a street, etc., across the Susquehanna river at the village of Owego.

Argued before HARDIN, P. J., and MARTIN and MERWIN, JJ.

No opinion. Order affirmed, with $10 costs and disbursements.
